description: This file sets up an image generation model using the Gemini API, integrates it with a WhatsApp API wrapper, and runs a web server to serve the app.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and response modalities.

classes.name: WhatsappAPI
classes.description: Wrapper for WhatsApp API integration, managing the app lifecycle.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Google's Gemini model used for image generation.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the web application instance for the WhatsApp API.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server to serve the app on specified port with optional reload.
